column1: The Officer  in  Charge  of the  Piliyandala Police  filed  information  in  terms

of  Section  66(1)(a)  of  the  Primary  Court  Procedure  Act  No. 
44  of  1979,

(hereinafter  referred  to  as  the  Act)  in 
the  Magistrates  Court  of Kesbewa,  against
the 2nd  party Petitioner-Appellant (hereinafter referred to  as  the  Appellant) and the

1 st  party  Respondent-Respondent, 
(hereinafter 
referred 
to  as 
the  Respondent)
